Windlord::

"All armor can brake"Windlord dificultly avoided the shot and h=
e fired 2 feather missiles against Train Wreck 

----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday,=
 May 29, 2001 10:38 PM
  Subject: Re: War at Chivtron's Base!!!


  The sho=
ts all hit Train Wreck. He laughed.

  Train Wreck: You are so foolish. My =
thick armor cannot be pierced so easily, especially by rapid fire shots.

 =
 Train Wreck raised the cannon. A huge, ugly monstrosity, and fired one ver=
y large blast at Windlord...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: a=
irly2000@... 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, May =
29, 2001 11:43 PM
    Subject: RE: War at Chivtron's Base!!!


    Windlord=
::

    "will be a pleasurehelp you, my friend ?" shouted Windlord an fired=
 25 times against Train Wreck
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      Fro=
m: Soulstice Omega 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, =
May 29, 2001 9:41 PM
      Subject: Re: War at Chivtron's Base!!!


      D=
eemos looks up in shock as the 8 blasts rain down upon him. He was hit by
 =
     every one of them. He cringes and shudders.

      Deemos: You coward,=
 you fire at me? You dare fire at me when we were having
      close combat=
? You lowly coward!

      Deemos stepped backwards, then turned and ran fo=
r a rock, meaning to use it
      as his shield from future blasts...

    =
  ----- Original Message -----
      From: <Rudra656@...>
      To: <nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com>
      Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 10:30 PM
      Subj=
ect: Re: War at Chivtron's Base!!!


      > ::Aerotaur::
      >     He st=
iffened at the voice behind him.  But only for an instant.  He
      then
 =
     > shot up higher into the sky.  The blast catches his left knee blowin=
g his
      > lower leg off.  He howls in pain.  "WINDLORD!  TAKE HIM OUT!"=
  He flies
      > higher unable to land.  Mech fluid gushes from his leg. =
 He opens another
      > eight shot barrage at Deemos.
